text: Lycidola flavofasciata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Waterhouse in 1880. It is known from Bolivia, Ecuador and French Guiana.BioLib.cz - Lycidola flavofasciata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Hemilophini Category:Beetles described in 1880
title: Lycidola flavofasciata
